LanguageData.CryptosleepBodysuit.label: Cryptosleep slave uniform
LanguageData.CryptosleepBodysuit.description: A full body suit designed for extended cryptosleep. You can rest easy knowing your body won't be naked for hundreds or thousands of years while you sleep.
LanguageData.SpeacialForces_Bodysuit.label: Marine Bodysuit
LanguageData.SpeacialForces_Bodysuit.description: A pair of green military overalls intended for marines.
